items: The issue with notes has been fixed.
YouTube and music searches will now be much less prone to spam (the issue where nothing appeared when searching has been fixed).
Issues such as data loading slowly and processes running with delays when entering applications have been fixed.
General optimization has been performed.
The issue causing the notifications page to appear blank on Frogger has been fixed.
When you retweeted old posts on Frogger, they appeared incorrectly on your profile. This has been fixed.
locales
html (remove old html file and put new)
editable
fxmanifest.lua
Company app redesigned.
Bank app redesigned.
JavaScript files have been optimized.
The Company section now displays the employee's rank and whether they are on duty in detail.
Now you can quickly send money to people in your contacts when sending money from the bank.
When adding a new user in message group, you used to have to enter the number manually. Now you can easily select from your contacts or enter it manually.
The lock screen has been adapted to light mode.
The design of notifications has been updated.
In Company app, when depositing or withdrawing money from the cash register/firing someone/changing rank, it was not updating instantly; this has been fixed.
The text translations in the Company application have been corrected.
The name and photo of the person newly added to the group were not visible in the messages; this has been fixed.
When the driver played a song in the music app, passengers in other seats couldn't hear it in some cases; this has been fixed.
The icon was not visible in call notifications; this has been fixed.
When app names were long, the apps on the home screen would shift to the left or right; this has been fixed.
The fuel leakage in vehicles called by the valet has been fixed.
Bank transaction older than one month are now automatically deleted.
locales
html (remove old html file and put new)
editable/cl_config.lua
editable/sv_config.lua
fxmanifest.lua
The assistant app is active again. You can also make it draw pictures by typing “draw a cat” or chat with it. (Don't expect high-quality results.)
Invoices app has been redesigned.
Garage app has been redesigned.
App Store app has been redesigned.
Messages > Profile has been updated.

Light (default), dark, and tinted (you can choose the color yourself) modes have now been added for all app icons. To edit, right-click on any app on the home screen and press the “Edit” button in the upper left corner.
The ability to comment on comments has been added to Frogger.
A retweet feature has been added to Frogger. You can add your own message and photo when retweeting posts.
App moving on the home screen has been improved; apps can now be placed in empty slots (they don't have to be next to each other).
You can now charge a fee for calling a vehicle with the valet service.
When entering the app, notifications on the lock screen were not being cleared; this has been fixed.
Now when you delete the app, it automatically logs you out of your account.
Apps couldn't be moved to other pages on the home screen; this has been fixed.
After opening Music, the dynamic island appeared black, and the volume and bass adjustment bars in the Music app were broken; this has been fixed.
When performing operations on PlayerData, the RAM usage spiked; this has been fixed.
The character name of a person who left Darkchat was visible to other group members; this has been fixed.
In the Yellow Pages app, you couldn't view both photos in listings with two photos. This has been fixed.
locales
html (remove old html file and put new)
editable
editable/cl_config.lua (replace Config.apps)
fxmanifest.lua
The Swiper (Tinder) app has been added. You have 10 swipes per day; you can purchase Swiper Gold for unlimited swipes.
A language change option has been added to Settings.
A “About Phone” section has been added to Settings.
A member limit has been added to Darkchat.
You can now change the font, color, and blend effect of the clock on the lock screen.
Pressing the flashlight on the lock screen used to take you to the home screen; this has been fixed.
Your home screen and lock screen wallpapers will no longer appear on your other characters.
Expired yellow pages, news, recent calls, and mails are now being deleted.
App notifications older than 1 month are now deleted.
The lag issue in messages in the Hacker app has been fixed; old messages now load when scrolled up.
In some cases, when saving 1 note, 2 were saved; this has been fixed.
Notes were rarely not visible in the Notes app; this has been fixed.
The server side of the sound system has been optimized.
The changed page on the home screen will no longer reset when entering apps.
In the Messages app, it was not possible to send money to someone who was not in the game, this has been fixed.
locales
html (remove old html file and put new)
editable
server/data (create folder named swiper')
fxmanifest.lua

A call feature has been added to the Company app. The grade levels specified in the config can enable receiving calls (a maximum of 1 player can be enabled per job; this resets upon each restart or log in/out). The person who enables the call receives it directly when the job is searched for.
The server side of Frogger messages, Frogly messages, and Frogram messages has been optimized.
The server side of the audio system has been optimized.
Some people's job data was coming in as 0, it will now default to unemployed.
In the music app, new music couldn't be opened while music was playing; this has been fixed.
The issue of employees not appearing in the Company app has been fixed.
The pet image displayed on Dynamic Island has been fixed.
The issue of not being able to see the contact and messages in some cases has been fixed..
tgiann-hotwire support has been added for garage app.
The issue of messages not being sent in darkchat has been fixed.
cylex_youtubeApp server side RPC error fixed.
locales
html (remove old html file and put new)
editable
fxmanifest.lua
The timer section in the Clock app was broken (showing NaN), fixed.
In the Company app, when exiting/entering the app while in the Transactions section, people were not visible, fixed.
Some people's occupation data was coming in as 0, it will now default to unemployed.
The issue of not being able to send messages in the Company app even though they were on duty has been fixed.
The issue of employees not appearing in the Company app has been fixed.
Now, if you are not the boss in the company, you cannot see the deposit/withdraw buttons.
You couldn't send money to someone who wasn't in the game in the Messages app, this has been fixed.
Several optimizations were made to fix the UI crash in the Music app.
The mine app in the casino was not working; this has been fixed.
In the mine app, the money won was displayed incorrectly in the UI at high mine counts; this has been fixed.
The unfair profit issue in the dice app in the casino has been fixed.
The issue where vehicle names were not visible in the garage app has been fixed.
tgiann-inventory support has been added.
An Auth with cloud sync system has been added. Please delete all clients and servers (except the data folder) and place the files from the update.
GarageData has been added to Config for situations where a vehicle cannot be removed with the valet if there is an invoice.
client  (remove all old client files and put new ones)
server (remove all old server files and put new ones)
core (remove folder)
sound (remove folder)
locales
html (remove old html file and put new)
editable
fxmanifest.lua
The notes app is now more detailed
2 new games have been added.
The music app no longer works with state bag, and the timeout issue experienced by 250+ players has been fixed.
At 2k and higher resolutions, indicators such as Wi-Fi and battery were distorted, as was the phone's frame; this has been fixed.
Phone props left in the air are now automatically deleted. (e.g., when you exit the game while holding your phone)
The getBills export has been adjusted; if the second parameter is true, it only displays unpaid invoices.
When users of jg-advancedgarages mark a vehicle, it now displays a warning if the vehicle is not in the game.
Music app and Metube app searches now work as clients
The issue preventing the use of GIFs in Frogger comments has been resolved.
The bills section has been removed from the banking app.
The SetVehicleFUEL function has been added to cl_functions.lua (you can now add your own fuel script export)
client
server (without data folder)
locales
html (remove old html file and put new)
editable
fxmanifest.lua
Significant performance improvements have been made.
Page transition animations on the main screen are now smoother.
Unwatched stories now appear in rainbow colors in the program. (If you've watched them, they appear gray.)
Alarms and timers now work on a character basis.
Recent calls are now automatically deleted after 14 days.
When sharing posts in Frogram, 4:3 photos could not be shared; this has been fixed.
Issues with 2k resolution in Frogram stories have been fixed.
The issue of photos appearing in pairs and old photos appearing at the top when sharing posts in Frogram has been fixed.
The white space visible in the frame on black interfaces has been fixed.
The thickness of the black frame around the phone has been reduced.
Fixed an issue where stories posted in the program appeared broken if there was no photo.
Unwatched stories now appear in rainbow colors in the program. (If you've watched them, they appear gray.)
client
server (without data folder)
locales
html (remove old html file and put new)
editable
fxmanifest.lua
Clock app has been added.
When the alarm goes off, you can snooze or stop it. People around you in the game can hear the alarm sound.
The phone appears in the bottom right corner 5 minutes before the alarm or timer goes off.
You can now change the color of the phone's frame in the settings. You can also choose Custom and set the color you want.
op-garages support has been added.
App opening animation is changed.
You can now quickly go to that letter's category by clicking on the blue letters in the contacts.
The coin icons in the banking app have been fixed.
When someone called you while you were on a call, the automatic ‘I called you but couldn't reach you’ message wasn't being sent; this has been fixed.
When creating a group in the Messages app, adding the same people would redirect you to someone else's group; this has been fixed.
Server-side sendMail export has been added, sendMail event has been removed.
When everyone's billing settings were disabled in Config, professions couldn't bill. This has been fixed.
The GiveVehicleKey function has been added to Config so it can give keys to the valet.
You can now see whether the other user has accepted what you sent via airdrop.
The issue of being able to send to the same person repeatedly via airdrop has been fixed.
When sending someone via airdrop, if their photo was broken, it looked distorted; this has been fixed.
There are now 2 photos per row in the program discovery, not 3.
Videos in the program discovery were opening slowly and causing the phone to lag; this has been fixed.
The esx:onPlayerSpawn event has been added for the phone to load when entering the esx game.
Batch save has also been implemented for Appaccounts. (It doesn't save repeatedly; it saves every 10 seconds).
Job and shift queries in the Company app weren't working in esx; this has been fixed.
Frogram was showing 2 stories when a story was shared, fixed.
Fixed apps not showing up when the phone restarted or when some players entered the game.
client
server (without data folder)
locales
html
core
editable
fxmanifest.lua
The colors of the music app have been changed.
Now, people with the same job in companies can send messages outside of working hours. They cannot see their own messages when they are on duty.
When a new post arrived while on your Twitter profile, the posts were visible. This has been fixed.
When a post was open on Twitter, exiting/entering the application resulted in a blank screen. This has been fixed.
When switching to the lock screen while listening to music, the Dynamic Island would freeze, but this has been fixed.
The issue where yellow pages were not visible for some users has been fixed.
When clicking on your own profile on Twitter, past tweets were not visible, this has been fixed.
In 'Take Photo' mode, it was not possible to switch to the rear camera, this has been fixed.
In 'Take Photo' mode, the camera could not be moved, this has been fixed.
Single messages could not be deleted in Darkchat, this has been fixed.
In the Business app, not all jobs were visible when assigning jobs; this has been fixed.
On Twitter, clicking on a notification in the in-app notification tab did not open the post; this has been fixed.
When the white button (back button) was pressed on the phone, the phone would shut down instead of exiting the app; this has been fixed.
client
server (without data folder)
locales
html
fxmanifest.lua
The ALT key used to move the character while using the phone and camera can now be changed in settings.
A small transaction history has been added to the calculator.
Notifications were coming even though the app was not installed, this has been fixed.
Bluetooth server no longer closes when restarted.
Posts were not loading when clicked on from the Twitter profile, this has been fixed.
Airplane mode, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and other information appeared to be turned off when exiting/entering the game, this has been fixed.
If the photo in the address book was broken, it appeared blank; this has been fixed.
In Airdrop, you can now see whether the other party has accepted or rejected what you sent.
In Airdrop, you can no longer send requests to the same person repeatedly.
client
server (without data folder)
locales
html
editable/cl_functions.lua
fxmanifest.lua
General RAM and performance improvements have been made.
All Twitter has been optimized.
Now, when Twitter opens, there will be no freezing, and it will open much faster.
Now, when you can't find a photo in the music app, it shows a more accurate photo.
Frogly discoveries were not sorted by date, this has been fixed.
When driving, you could move the car by opening the camera and pressing the bottom button; this has been fixed.
When using the rear camera, you couldn't see yourself in the mirrors; this has been fixed.
client
server (without data folder)
locales
html
fxmanifest.lua
Logging in/out of app accounts has been sped up.
Zoom in/out has been added to the front camera.
The camera has been updated.
Discord links can no longer be added to the gallery and general photos.
When in selfie mode, pressing the bottom button now allows you to move the camera up and down with the mouse and rotate the character with the left and right mouse buttons.
The issue of exiting the app while tapping cards in Unoda has been resolved.
The issue of names not appearing on invoices has been fixed.
The issue of character data being corrupted when logging out has been fixed.
The issue of not being able to see the button in the news app has been fixed.
The issue of being able to click on pd without pd in the invoices app has been fixed.
The issue of not being able to capture the job when the phone is first turned on has been fixed.
The issue where you couldn't see yourself in mirrors while using the rear camera has been fixed.
client
server (without data folder)
locales
html
editable/sv_config.lua
The backend of messages has been optimized.
When calling from a private number, an automatic message was sent if the person was not in the game; this has been fixed.
When logging out of an account in the app and creating a new account, messages from the old account remained; this has been fixed.
Long names were scrolling down in the businesses section of the businesses app, fixed.
In the businesses app, if no one is on duty in the professions, it doesn't show up in green.
When sending a new message, if the list was too long, you couldn't scroll down, fixed.
After adding a video in messages, it couldn't be removed from the preview, fixed.
After uploading the update files, create a folder named 'messages' in the server/data/messages directory, then restart.
Notification counts on the home page have been optimized.
Airdrop performance has been improved.
A swipe animation for unlocking and locking has been added to the lock screen.
The date on the lock screen has been adjusted; the time and date now match the background photo's color.
You can now set separate wallpapers for the home screen and lock screen. (Previously used backgrounds have been reset.)
Posts purchased on Frogly were not updating instantly, this has been fixed.
Messages app notification count was not showing on first login to the game, this has been fixed.
The app movement on the main page has been optimized; apps can now be moved from page 1 to page 2 and are more stable.
You can now add wallpapers either from pre-made background photos, your gallery, or by taking a photo on the spot or using a URL.
The error in the Frogly notification tab has been fixed.
Like animation added to Frogram.
Speaker reactivated during calls. (beta)
A search bar has been added to the Messages app.
Now, ambient sounds are recorded to video while recording video.
The Control Center has been updated, and you can now mute notifications from here as well.
A feature to call with a hidden number has been added. You can make a hidden call by adding # before the number you want to call in the keypad section.
Fixed issue where posts did not appear when scrolling down in Frogly.
Fixed issue where audio was recorded to video even without pressing the microphone button while recording video.
Frogly's light mode has been fixed.
The number of likes on Frogly profiles was being calculated incorrectly; this has been fixed.
When the phone is on silent mode, a notification now appears next to the clock.
The notification location was sometimes glitching; this has been fixed.
When deleting a message in the Messages app while there were unread messages, the number of unread messages remained. This has been fixed.
